short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A non-custodial custodian crypto gateway to our blockchain ecosystem.
short.zh_CN: 非托管式托管加密钱包
short.zh_TW: 非託管式託管加密錢包

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Native AkashicChain Wallet Application
AkashicLink is an extension that can interact directly with AkashicChain in your browser!

Non-Custodial, Total Security
- AkashicLink ensures ultra-security as your Non-Custodial wallet
- Your keys are split, stored, and encrypted separately for enhanced security
- Exclusively accessible to you and you alone, ensuring utmost privacy and control

Features
- Cost-Efficiency - Pay less per transfer, fixed fee at 0.1USDT
- Ease of Use - Send, Receive, or Deposit with intuitive control
- Your Gateway to Layer 2 - Enjoy increased fluidity on AkashicChain
- Supports Akashic Alias - No more long, overly complex wallet addresses

You can always view the public codebase of AkashicLink on Github:
https://github.com/akashicsuite/akashiclink
